title: Sorry sorry
author: JGray
text:
I apologize for this page being late, folks, and for it not being finished. We'll have the color up soon. Hopefully tomorrow. This is the black and white almost done. I decided to give what we could as soon as possible.

Thank you for your patience.

replies.author: TC*Guest*
replies.text: Niiiice.  "Few zeroes short of a price tag."  That's a new spin on the old phrase.

replies.author: adamas*Guest*
replies.text: Yeah I'd say it's Quest, who else has ever called her by her full name?

replies.author: Emma*Guest*
replies.text:
I'm glad for the rough. I come for the story not the art.

Heehee, few zeroes short of a price tag.
